jminusminus

? JClassDeclaration

  • java.lang.Object
    • jminusminus.JAST
      • jminusminus.JClassDeclaration
  • ????????:
    JTypeDecl

    class JClassDeclaration
extends JAST
implements JTypeDecl
    A class declaration has a list of modifiers, a name, a super class and a class block; it distinguishes between instance fields and static (class) fields for initialization, and it defines a type. It also introduces its own (class) context.

    • ????

      • ??????? jminusminus.JAST

        compilationUnit, line

      Construct an AST node for a class declaration given the line number, list of class modifiers, name of the class, its super class type, and the class block.

      • JClassDeclaration

        public JClassDeclaration(int line,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> mods,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         Type superType,
                         java.util.ArrayList<JMember> classBlock)
        Construct an AST node for a class declaration given the line number, list of class modifiers, name of the class, its super class type, and the class block.
        ??:
        line - line in which the class declaration occurs in the source file.
        mods - class modifiers.
        name - class name.
        superType - super class type.
        classBlock - class block.
